definition: surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Diagnosis of leakage was made by clinical features or abdominal CT-scans.
sentences.chinese: 吻合口瘘的诊断主要依据临床表现和腹部CT。

sentences.english: To evaluate the effect of excision of the fistulous tract in the treatment of congenital lacrimal sac fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估泪囊瘘摘除术治疗先天性泪囊瘘的效果。

sentences.english: To evaluate the effect of excision of the fistulous tract in the treatment of congenital lacrimal sac fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估泪囊瘘摘除术治疗先天性泪囊瘘的效果。

sentences.english: The major complication was pancreatic pseudocyst and abdominal fistula.
sentences.chinese: 并发症主要是胰外瘘和胰腺假性囊肿。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the curative effect of contradrainage and thread drawing method to treat high anal horseshoe fistula (HAHS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨对口引流挂线在治疗高位马蹄瘘的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To delve an effective method to prevent anastomotic leakage and stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨预防食管胃吻合口瘘和吻合口狭窄的方法。

sentences.english: Side to side anastomosis is preferred to build anatomical snuffbox arteriovenous fistula.
sentences.chinese: 侧侧吻合术式可作为鼻烟窝内瘘首选术式。

sentences.english: Compared to ureter fistula, stomas fistula occurred earlier with great leaked volume.
sentences.chinese: 吻合口瘘发生时间相对较早，漏尿量大。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the nursing character of artery and vein fistula replanted by artificial vas.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨人造血管移植建立动静脉内瘘的护理特点。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and embolization therapy of the uterine arteriovenous malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨子宫动静脉瘘的诊断和栓塞治疗的价值。

sentences.english: In 40 cases receiving anterior resection, no anastomotic stoma fistula occurred.
sentences.chinese: 行前切除术的40例无吻合口瘘发生。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of a modified anastomotic technique on preventing anastomotic leakage and stricture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨防止食管癌术后吻合口瘘及狭窄的吻合术式。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate diagnose and treatment of dural arteriovenous fistula in anterior cranial fossa.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨前颅窝底区硬脑膜动静脉瘘的早期诊治。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the main points of caring patients with retention of urine after the operations of archosyrinx and haemorrhoids.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结痔瘘手术后患者尿潴留的护理要点。

sentences.english: Results All fistula of 6 cases were closed up and the abcesses disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 结果6例吻合口瘘患者经治疗瘘口愈合，脓腔消失。

sentences.english: No local peritonitis or uncurable fistula occurred after withdrawal of the tube.
sentences.chinese: 拔管后无局限性腹膜炎或瘘口迁延不愈。
